Shockwave/Unitron:




Shockwave had turned about, and got a target lock, firing off fifteen rapid 
laser blasts at McGowan followed by a missile.

---

"You want to play?" Unitron got a lock and fired off twenty rapid laser 
blasts down at Depp from his nosecone weapon.
